alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 30 at 1:23PM MDT until April 02 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest wind 35 to 45 mph with gusts to around 60 mph. Gusts 70 to 80 mph possible along Wyoming Highway 28 at Red Canyon and in the mountains. * WHERE...Lander Foothills and the east slope of the Wind River Mountains. * WHEN...9 AM Saturday until 9 AM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest potential for high wind in Lander is late Saturday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East
